ISSUE.TITLE: Flowable-Modeler/Flowable-Task: Multiple SLF4J Bindings Warning on Start-Up
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When Flowable-Modeler version 6.3.0 is starting the following warning is displayed: ``` SLF4J: Class path contains multiple SLF4J bindings. SLF4J: Found binding in [jar:file:/apache-tomcat/webapps/flowable-modeler/WEB-INF/lib/slf4j-log4j12-1.7.25.jar!/org/slf4j/impl/StaticLoggerBinder.class] SLF4J: Found binding in [jar:file:/apache-tomcat/webapps/flowable-modeler/WEB-INF/lib/log4j-slf4j-impl-2.10.0.jar!/org/slf4j/impl/StaticLoggerBinder.class] SLF4J: See http://www.slf4j.org/codes.html#multiple_bindings for an explanation. SLF4J: Actual binding is of type [org.slf4j.impl.Log4jLoggerFactory] ``` When Flowable-Task version 6.3.0 is starting the same warning is displayed: ``` SLF4J: Class path contains multiple SLF4J bindings. SLF4J: Found binding in [jar:file:/apache-tomcat/webapps/flowable-task/WEB-INF/lib/slf4j-log4j12-1.7.25.jar!/org/slf4j/impl/StaticLoggerBinder.class] SLF4J: Found binding in [jar:file:/apache-tomcat/webapps/flowable-task/WEB-INF/lib/log4j-slf4j-impl-2.10.0.jar!/org/slf4j/impl/StaticLoggerBinder.class] SLF4J: See http://www.slf4j.org/codes.html#multiple_bindings for an explanation. SLF4J: Actual binding is of type [org.slf4j.impl.Log4jLoggerFactory] ``` The start-up of the other flowable-ui-apps do not cause this warning to be displayed.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #981 from flowable/jacarui-dockerfile-maven-plugin Dockerfile maven plugin: updated

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Revert "fixes #983 multiple SLF4J binding warnings" This reverts commit f22801a5df1cb8c1436eb5ef7b08342b412c3574.
Merge pull request #987 from flowable/fix-#983 fixes #983 multiple SLF4J binding warnings
